pr_title: LUCENE-9446: In boolean rewrite, remove MatchAllDocsQuery filter clauses

timeline.message:
LUCENE-9446: Remove MatchAllDocsQuery filters in boolean write.

Previously, we only removed 'match all' FILTER clauses if there was at least one
MUST clause. Now they're also removed if there is another distinct FILTER clause.

This lets boolean queries like `#field:value #*:*` be written to `#field:value`.

timeline.bodyText: maybe also add a test for the case when there are two MatchAllDocsQuery queries as filters with no MUST clauses?
timeline.author: jpountz
